meanings.definition: An animal, especially a large or dangerous one.
meanings.sent1: The beast roared loudly in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The lion is known as the king of beasts.
meanings.sent3: The beast tried to play hide and seek with the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her hunger felt like a wild beast inside her.
meanings.sent5: The beast's eyes glowed in the darkness of the night.

meanings.definition: A person who is cruel, violent, or uncivilized.
meanings.sent1: The bully at school was a real beast to others.
meanings.sent2: The beast of a man scared everyone with his temper.
meanings.sent3: The beast of a boss made everyone work late on Fridays.
meanings.sent4: His anger turned him into a raging beast.
meanings.sent5: The beast's words cut deeper than any sword.

meanings.definition: Something that is extremely difficult or unpleasant.
meanings.sent1: Cleaning the garage was a real beast of a task.
meanings.sent2: The math test was a real beast to complete on time.
meanings.sent3: The beast of a challenge made her want to give up.
meanings.sent4: Facing her fears was like battling a fierce beast.
meanings.sent5: The beast of a storm raged outside, making it impossible to go out.
